title: can you play league of legends in safe mode with networking?
body: my PC will not start on regular mode, and before saying 'why dont you fix your pc in safe mode lol noob' believe me I tried

replies.body: I don't think it would be a good idea, as you're running the OS in its most basic form and will likely fail to render the game.  It may end up causing you more trouble.  If your issue is specifically with your PC, I'm not sure I'd be able to help unless you're having specific errors with League.  Let me know.
